title: Implement ovault open command
description:
Add command to open notes in Obsidian:
- Parse file argument
- Resolve vault name
- Generate Obsidian URI: obsidian://open?vault=NAME&file=PATH
- Handle cross-platform differences (macOS, Linux, WSL)
- Add --open flag support to new and edit commands

title: Implement ovault schema enum management
description:
Enum CRUD operations:
- ovault schema add-enum: create new enum
- ovault schema edit-enum --add: add value
- ovault schema edit-enum --rename: rename value (with file updates)
- ovault schema edit-enum --remove: remove value (prompt for replacement)
- ovault schema list-enums: show all enums with usage

title: Implement ovault schema show command
description:
Add schema exploration commands:
- ovault schema show: tree view of all types/subtypes
- ovault schema show <type>: detailed view of specific type
- ovault schema validate: check schema structure
- Show shared fields, enums, field configurations
- Pretty-print output with proper indentation

title: Port lib/list.sh to src/lib/vault.ts
description:
Port vault file operations:
- listFiles() - enumerate files by type
- findFile() - locate a specific file
- discoverManagedFiles() - find all ovault-managed files
- getVaultPath() - resolve vault location
- Use fast-glob for pattern matching

title: Implement template constraints
description:
Add validation rules to templates:
- constraints section in template frontmatter
- required: true to make optional fields required
- validate: expression for custom validation
- error: custom error message
- Use query expression syntax for validation
- Validate constraints at note creation time
- Report constraint violations clearly

title: Implement schema migration system
description:
Track and apply schema changes:
- Schema versioning in schema.json
- Track pending migrations
- ovault schema diff: show pending changes
- ovault schema apply: execute migrations
- Auto-apply deterministic changes
- Prompt for non-deterministic changes
- Log migration history

title: Implement bulk --move with wikilink auto-update
description:
Add file move operation with link updates:
- --move path: relocate files to new directory
- Scan vault for wikilinks to moved files
- Update all wikilinks to point to new location
- Handle all wikilink formats: [[File]], [[File|Alias]], [[File#Heading]]
- Respect shortest-path link preference
- Report link updates made

title: Phase 1: Core CLI Polish
description:
Core features that enhance the CLI experience. Depends on TypeScript migration.

Includes:
- Shared fields support
- Directory modes (pooled vs instance-grouped)
- Open in Obsidian
- Query system with Bases parity
- Schema show command

See plans/roadmap.md Phase 1 section.

title: Port lib/body.sh to src/lib/frontmatter.ts
description:
Port frontmatter parsing and writing:
- parseFrontmatter() - extract frontmatter and body from markdown
- writeFrontmatter() - serialize frontmatter back to markdown
- updateFrontmatter() - modify specific fields preserving order
- Use gray-matter library for parsing
- Preserve field order and body content

title: Implement parent templates for instance scaffolding
description:
Add instance scaffolding to templates:
- instances array in template frontmatter
- Each instance: subtype, filename, template, defaults
- Create parent note and all specified subtypes
- Support nested templates for subtypes
- Report all files created
- Works with instance-grouped directory mode

title: Port ovault new command
description:
Port the new note creation command:
- Parse type/subtype argument
- Load schema and get type configuration
- Prompt for field values (using prompts library)
- Generate frontmatter with correct field order
- Create file in correct directory
- Handle both pooled and instance-grouped modes

title: Port ovault list command with expression filtering
description:
Port the list command with enhanced filtering:
- Parse type argument
- Load files of that type
- Parse and evaluate --where expressions
- Format output as table
- Support --fields to select columns
- Support --format for json/csv output
- Use expression parser for filter evaluation

title: Implement expression parser for query system
description:
Create query expression parser using jsep:
- Parse comparison expressions (==, !=, <, >, etc.)
- Parse boolean expressions (&&, ||, !)
- Parse function calls (contains, isEmpty, today, etc.)
- Parse field access and member expressions
- Implement expression evaluation with context
- Add duration literal parsing ('7d', '1w', etc.)

See plans/features/query-system.md for full operator/function list.

title: Phase 3: Template System
description:
Reusable note templates with defaults, constraints, and scaffolding. Depends on Phase 1.

Includes:
- Basic templates with defaults and body structure
- Template constraints (validation rules)
- Parent templates for instance scaffolding
- Template discovery and selection

See plans/features/template-system.md

title: Phase 2: Audit & Bulk Operations
description:
Vault health and mass operations. Depends on Phase 1.

Includes:
- Audit command (report, fix, strict modes)
- Bulk operations (set, rename, move, delete)
- Wikilink auto-update on file moves

See plans/features/audit-command.md and plans/features/bulk-operations.md

title: Implement ovault bulk command
description:
Add bulk operations per plans/features/bulk-operations.md:
- --set field=value: set field
- --set field=: clear field
- --rename old=new: rename field
- --delete field: delete field
- --append field=value: add to list
- --remove field=value: remove from list
- --where expression: filter targets
- Dry-run by default, --execute to apply
- --backup option for safety
- Git status warnings

title: Implement directory modes (pooled and instance-grouped)
description:
Add directory mode support per plans/features/directory-modes.md:
- Add dir_mode field to type schema (pooled | instance-grouped)
- Pooled: all files in output_dir
- Instance-grouped: files under parent instance folders
- Parent type = instance field for subtypes
- Create parent note with same name as folder
- Update ovault new to prompt for instance when needed
- Update ovault list to show instances for instance-grouped types
- Add filename patterns for subtypes ({n}, {date}, etc.)

title: Add integration tests for CLI commands
description:
End-to-end testing of CLI:
- Test ovault new with various types
- Test ovault edit with --set flags
- Test ovault list with --where filters
- Test ovault open
- Test error handling and edge cases

title: Implement shared fields support
description:
Add shared fields feature per plans/features/shared-fields.md:
- Add shared_fields section to schema structure
- Implement opt-in model (types list which shared fields to include)
- Support field_overrides for type-specific defaults
- Merge shared fields with type fields in getFieldsForType()
- Shared fields appear first by default
- Update new/edit commands to handle shared fields
- Add tests for shared field merging and ordering

title: Phase 0: TypeScript Migration
description:
Migrate ovault from Bash to TypeScript. This is blocking for all other work. See plans/features/typescript-migration.md for full specification.

Key deliverables:
- Initialize TypeScript project with Commander CLI
- Port schema loading with Zod validation
- Port frontmatter parsing with gray-matter
- Port all existing commands (new, edit, list)
- Add expression parser for query system
- Set up Vitest testing with >80% coverage
- Achieve feature parity with v1 shell implementation

title: Initialize TypeScript project with package.json and tsconfig
description:
Set up the TypeScript project structure:
- Initialize package.json with correct metadata
- Configure tsconfig.json for Node.js target
- Set up Commander for CLI framework
- Add Zod for schema validation
- Configure esbuild/tsup for bundling
- Set up npm bin entry point

title: Define Zod schemas for schema.json validation
description:
Create TypeScript type definitions and Zod schemas:
- Schema type (version, shared_fields, enums, types)
- Type configuration (output_dir, dir_mode, frontmatter)
- Field definitions (prompt, enum, required, default)
- Subtype definitions
- Export inferred TypeScript types from Zod schemas

title: Implement basic template support
description:
Add template discovery and usage:
- Templates in Templates/{type}/{subtype}/{name}.md
- Parse template frontmatter (type: template, template-for, defaults)
- Template discovery by type path
- default.md as default template
- --template flag to specify template
- --default flag to use default template
- --no-template to skip templates
- Skip prompting for fields with defaults

title: Set up Vitest testing infrastructure
description:
Configure testing framework:
- Install and configure Vitest
- Set up test fixtures directory structure
- Create test helpers for vault mocking
- Configure coverage reporting
- Add test scripts to package.json

title: Implement ovault audit --fix modes
description:
Add interactive and auto-fix modes to audit:
- --fix: interactive mode, prompt for each issue
- --fix --auto: auto-apply deterministic fixes
- --strict: unknown fields are errors
- Auto-fixable: missing required with default
- Prompt-required: invalid enum, wrong directory, unknown field
- Track and report fix results

title: Add unit tests for lib functions (>80% coverage)
description:
Comprehensive unit testing:
- Test schema loading and validation
- Test frontmatter parsing/writing
- Test expression parser and evaluation
- Test vault operations
- Achieve >80% line coverage

title: Port lib/schema.sh to src/lib/schema.ts
description:
Port schema loading and utilities:
- loadSchema() - load and validate schema from .ovault/schema.json
- getTypeConfig() - get configuration for a type/subtype
- getFieldsForType() - get merged fields (shared + type-specific)
- resolveEnum() - get enum values by name
- resolveDynamicSource() - resolve dynamic field sources

title: Implement ovault schema add-field command
description:
Add field to existing type:
- Prompt for field name
- Prompt for prompt type
- Prompt for enum (if select)
- Prompt for required/default
- Add to type configuration
- Offer to add to existing files

title: Phase 4: Schema Management CLI
description:
Full CLI control over schema - never touch JSON directly. Depends on Phase 1.

Includes:
- Type/subtype management (add, edit, remove)
- Field management
- Shared field management
- Enum management
- Migration system

See plans/features/schema-management.md

title: Implement ovault schema add-type command
description:
Interactive type creation:
- Prompt for output directory
- Prompt for directory mode
- Prompt for shared fields to include
- Prompt for type-specific fields
- Prompt for subtypes (for instance-grouped)
- Save to schema.json
- Validate after changes

title: Port existing tests to Vitest
description:
Migrate existing shell tests to Vitest:
- Port test_list.sh tests
- Port test_new.sh tests
- Update test fixtures for TypeScript
- Ensure all v1 functionality is tested

title: Implement ovault audit command (report mode)
description:
Add audit command per plans/features/audit-command.md:
- Discover all managed files
- Check for missing required fields
- Check for invalid enum values
- Check for wrong directory location
- Check for unknown fields (warn by default)
- Check for type mismatches
- Check for orphan files (no type field)
- Report issues with clear messages
- Support filtering by type or path

title: Phase 5: Recurrence & Output Formats
description:
Recurring task creation and additional output formats.

Includes:
- Recurrence rules and spawning
- JSON/CSV/Dataview output formats

Lower priority - build after core features stabilize.

title: Phase 6: Agentic Workflows
description:
AI-powered automation with vault-based workflow management.

Includes:
- Prompt and Agent types
- Workflow definitions
- OpenRouter integration
- Cost tracking

See plans/features/agentic-workflows.md

Lowest priority - experimental feature.

title: Port ovault edit command
description:
Port the edit existing note command:
- Parse file argument
- Load and parse existing frontmatter
- Determine note type from frontmatter
- Prompt for fields to edit (with current values)
- Update frontmatter preserving body
- Handle --set flag for non-interactive editing
